description:
As Asami is showing feelings for Ichimaru during school, despite Asami`s efforts to hide it, she encourages Asami to take action more than once. She is hopeful that they will begin dating soon.
Does not know about Asami`s & Ichimaru`s marriage.
Sits next to Asami in class.
Changes boyfriend throughout the series.
name: Endou Satomi
